App.GetSystemAboutInfo.appName.label: Portal
App.GetSystemAboutInfo.label: About
App.GetSystemAboutInfo.contentPart1.text: Firm Foundation Academy Reader is a "smart" ebook reading platform with integrated tools designed to facilitate the reading and study of difficult literature. The reader includes tools to facilitate both independent study and also teacher-coordinated classroom study. The purpose of the FFA reader and the Academy itself is to promote liberal education through bridging the difficult gap between aspiring student and difficult but valuable literature.
App.GetSystemAboutInfo.contentPart2.text: We believe that the study of great literature is the best means for grounding students in the most important philosophical questions of life. This grounding empowers students to participate in a broad civilization-building discourse that stretches back into antiquity and constitutes the real basis of civilization and of effective citizenship.
App.GetSystemAboutInfo.linkText.text: Find our more about Firm Foundation Academy at our website:
